name: Galaxy Drift VR
description:
Race through the galaxy in your virtual reality spaceship and try to beat your highscores!

This virtual reality racing game was developed in only five days. You control a spaceship and have to fly through all portals in the correct order to finish a course.

Features:

  • ⌛️ 3 different courses to play
  • 🎮 Fully controllable spaceship in VR
  • ⭐ Fun challenges and medals to earn for each course

⌨️ Controls:

  • Use the grip button of your VR controller to control interactables in the ship
  • Drag the joystick in the cockpit in the desired direction to control the rotation of the ship
  • Grab and push the throttle control on the right to change your speed
